title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8196.2 - Statements of income and expenses related to economic units
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8196.2 - Statements of income and expenses related to economic units

State Regulations
(a) Statements of income and expenses and
production submitted pursuant to this Title shall be made available to a person
seeking to inspect same only after that person shall have completed and signed
a form prescribed by ORPTS which shall include the following information: (1)
the name of the person seeking to
inspect; (2)
specific reference to
the statements sought to be inspected or copied sufficient to identify them to
the custodian of the statements; (3)
a statement certifying that the
inspection of the form is for purposes of administrative or judicial review of
assessments; (4)
the administrative
or judicial body before which the assessment is to be reviewed; and
(5)
the date on which the producer whose
information is the subject of the proposed disclosure was given written notice
of such proposed disclosure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
8196.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
